content.body: shu: The delegates meeting is happening right now, right?
content.formatted_body: shu: The delegates meeting is happening right now, right?

content.body: Or wait, now I'm confused; the email said "Finalizing the time to June 10, 9:00 - 10:00 AM PDT." but the gh issue says "June 17"
Ah, found the issue. @shu fyi for next time, don't *just* edit comments with important new information, because edits aren't reflected into email. Edit *and* post a new comment, plz
content.formatted_body: Ah, found the issue. @shu fyi for next time, don't just edit comments with important new information, because edits aren't reflected into email. Edit and post a new comment, plz
